thread.title: Man nabbed from toilet on train to RotterdamTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Man nabbed from toilet on train to RotterdamTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Man nabbed from toilet on train to RotterdamTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Man nabbed from toilet on train to Rotterdam Published on : Friday, September 18, 2015
Dutch police arrested a man who had locked himself inside a toilet aboard a Thalys train at Rotterdam central station, Dutch media reports said.
Earlier police had to order everyone off the Paris-bound train and evacuated seven station platforms as a precautionary measure.
Train operator Thalys said police had the situation “under control” and passengers were not at risk.
Last month passengers overpowered a gunman aboard an Amsterdam-Paris Thalys train in northern France.
One passenger tweeted that the man had jumped aboard the train just before it began leaving. It is not yet clear who the arrested man is nor why he acted as he did.
